data.title: BS 381c Light Purple Brown 449 Paint Aerosol
data.meta_description: Low price BS 381c Light Purple Brown 449 Paint Free UK P&P
data.text:
BS 381c Light Purple Brown 449 Paint is a distinguished shade from the British Standard BS 381C Spray Paint Colour Chart, available in three distinct types of aerosol spray paints: Cellulose, Acrylic, and Synthetic Enamel.

Each paint is custom-mixed using only the finest quality Lechler paint colours and binders to ensure supreme quality and durability.

BS 381c Light Purple Brown 449 Paint is offered in various formats including 400ml 1 Pack (1K) and 2 Pack (2K) aerosol cans — the latter features an integrated hardener — as well as litre tins, and touch-up options such as pots or pens.

Additional customisation options include a range of gloss levels, from Full Matt (0% Gloss) to Full Gloss (90% Gloss), allowing for precise finish specifications.

We also provide optional enhancements such as deodoriser, UV protection, and high-resistance additives, tailored to your specific requirements.

Our aerosols are equipped with a unique vari-nozzle that offers both wide and narrow spray options, delivering HVLP-style atomisation with minimal overspray and consistent pressure for optimum application.
